visualisation.Rmd

KWB-R Packages on Github Over Time

options(github_token = Sys.getenv("GITHUB_PAT"))
pkgs <- pkgmeta::get_github_packages()

#pkgs <- readRDS("rpackages.RData")
pkgmeta::plot_github_pkgs_over_time(pkgs)
